report_title: Industry Report on Collaboration and Project Management Software
executive_summary: Currently proving instrumental in reshaping the operations and workflows within enterprises across diverse sectors, the industry is experiencing dramatic changes. In the last few years, technological advancements have enabled vendors to democratize productivity platforms, making them accessible and customized across diverse entities. This resulted in growth at a CAGR of 4.5% over the past five years, when revenue will reach $2.6 billion, including a 4.3% boost in 2023 alone.

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: No-code Productivity Platforms Puts Clients in Control
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: The industry is experiencing a democratization process, as a single collaboration suite can now take on many millions of forms to suit the millions of teams interfacing with the software every day.

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: Project Management Software Now Analyzes Automatically Collected Employee Performance Data
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: In response to escalating demands from project managers for improved decision-making tools, the collaboration and project management software sector now incorporates advanced data and analytics features.

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: Security and Compliance As An Afterthought Comes Closer to Extinction
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: Security and compliance have ascended as a paramount concern among project management software users.

future_outlook.future_outlook_point_title: AI and Machine-Learning Will Automate Most Resource Allocation and Repetitivity in Project Management
future_outlook.future_outlook_point_description: As the next game-changers on the project management playground, Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Machine Learning (ML) will change how businesses strategize and allocate resources in projects of all sizes.

future_outlook.future_outlook_point_title: Collaboration Software Picks Up Its Own Digital Collaboration Capabilities
future_outlook.future_outlook_point_description: As the core of many businesses, project management software can facilitate integration across business systems like CRM, ERP, and HR.

future_outlook.future_outlook_point_title: Project Management Goes Mobile, With an Array of Consequences
future_outlook.future_outlook_point_description: With the world gravitating towards work-from-anywhere models due to the pandemic's influences, demand for mobile-friendly project management tools is gearing up.

industry_definition: Companies in this industry offer collaboration and project management software to aid in the organization and communication of businesses.
key_trends: The industry is undergoing profound changes, enabling personalized and democratized productivity platforms.
Although technological advancements signal a promising industry, economic uncertainties could challenge growth.

market_segmentation.segment_description: Other markets include manufacturing, government entities, retail and consumer goods.
The IT and telecommunications category includes companies involved in the creation and distribution of technology products and services.
The BFSI sector comprises some of the largest institutions in the world.

products_and_services.product_description: Standard subscription plans represent the highest usage rates because of its applicability to small businesses.
Premium subscriptions enhance the features of the base subscriptions.
Enterprise solutions offer everything that premium services offer but are fine-tuned to fit a much larger workforce.

tier_1_suppliers: Operating Systems & Productivity Software Publishing in the US
Database, Storage & Backup Software Publishing in the US
tier_2_suppliers: Computer Peripheral Manufacturing in the US
tier_1_buyers: Finance and Insurance in the US

demand_determinants.determinant_title: Standard Subscriptions Represent the Highest Usage Among Subscription Plans
demand_determinants.determinant_description: The standard subscription package offers the lowest features outside of free and introductory packages.

business_locations.location_description: The Great Lakes region has 16.7% of establishments.

FAQs.question: What are some significant software developer conferences in the US?
FAQs.answer: Some of the significant software developer conferences in the US are the annual Apple Worldwide Developers Conference (WWDC), Microsoft Build Conference and Google I/O.
